^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ACVoltage.description: Contains the array of 1 or more AC voltage sensors.
ACVoltage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure AC voltage.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Amperage.description: Contains the array of 1 or more amperage sensors.
Amperage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure amperage.

Energy.description: The Energy for this AC Input.
Energy.longDescription: This property shall indicate the Energy information of this AC Input.

Frequency.description: Contains the array of 1 or more frequency sensors.
Frequency.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure frequency.

MemberId.description: This is the identifier for the member within the collection.
MemberId.longDescription: The value of this string shall uniquely identify the member within the collection.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

RealPower.description: The Real Power for this AC Input.
RealPower.longDescription: This property shall indicate the Real Power information of this AC Input.

RmsUnderOverVoltage.description: The RMS Under/Over Voltage for this AC Input.
RmsUnderOverVoltage.longDescription: This property shall indicate the RMS Under/Over Voltage information of this AC Input.

AcInputActions.description: The available actions for this resource.
AcInputActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

DCVoltage.description: Contains the array of 1 or more DC voltage sensors.
DCVoltage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure DC voltage.

MemberId.description: This is the identifier for the member within the collection.
MemberId.longDescription: The value of this string shall uniquely identify the member within the collection.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Status.description: The Status for this DC Bus.
Status.longDescription: This property shall indicate the Status of this DC Bus.

DcBusActions.description: The available actions for this resource.
DcBusActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Rectifier.description: This is the schema definition for a Rectifier.
Rectifier.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a Rectifier for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AcInput.description: This is the definition for AC Input.
AcInput.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for AC Input for a Redfish implementation.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Alarms.description: Contains the naivgation pointer to the equipment Alarm collection.
Alarms.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type AlarmCollection that contains the alarms for the equipment.

Amperage.description: Contains the array of 1 or more amperage sensors.
Amperage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure amperage.

AssetTag.description: The actual Asset Tag of Rectifier.
AssetTag.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Asset Tag of Rectifier.

DateOfManufacture.description: The date of manufacture of Rectifier.
DateOfManufacture.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual date of manufacture of Rectifier.

DcBus.description: This is the definition for DC Bus.
DcBus.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for DC Bus for a Redfish implementation.

FirmwareRevision.description: The actual Firmware Revision of Rectifier.
FirmwareRevision.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Firmware Revision of Rectifier.

HardwareRevision.description: The actual Hardware Revision of Rectifier.
HardwareRevision.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Hardware Revision of Rectifier.

InputSourceStatus.description: The actual Input Source Status value of Rectifier.
InputSourceStatus.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Input Source Status value of Rectifier.

Manufacturer.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Manufacturer of Rectifier.

Model.description: The actual Model Number of Rectifier.
Model.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Model Number of Rectifier.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

OutputSourceStatus.description: The actual Output Source Status value of Rectifier.
OutputSourceStatus.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Output Source Status value of Rectifier.

PartNumber.description: The actual Part Number of Rectifier.
PartNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Part Number of Rectifier.

PhysicalLocation.description: The actual Physical Location of Rectifier.
PhysicalLocation.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Physical Location of Rectifier.

RealPower.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Power information of this AC Input.

Sensors.description: The naivgation pointer to the collection of sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.
Sensors.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type SensorCollection that contains the sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.

SerialNumber.description: The actual Serial Number of Rectifier.
SerialNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Serial Number of Rectifier.

Status.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Status of Rectifier.

Temperature.description: Contains the array of 1 or more temperature sensors.
Temperature.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure temperature.

TotalInputPower.description: The actual Total Input Power value for Rectifier.
TotalInputPower.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Total Input Power value of this AC Input.

TriggeredAlarms.description: Contains the array of 0 or more triggered alarms.
TriggeredAlarms.longDescription: This array shall contain the set of Members of the Alarm Collection which have an 'AlarmStatus' of 'Triggered'.

title: #Rectifier.v0_2_0.Rectifier
